properties.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity/Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 30 at 7:56PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
Areas of snow showers, heavy at times, will continue sagging south
across Pueblo, Huerfano and Las Animas counties through midnight.
The focus of the snow is expected to be along the I-25 corridor
and west, with the heaviest amounts banked up against the eastern
slopes of the Wet Mountains and the southern Sangre de Cristo
Mountains. 3 inches of new snow was reported in Monument as the
wave of snow moved through.

Where the snow falls this evening, very localized patchy fog may
develop during the overnight hours. Otherwise plan on clearing
skies overnight and a very cold start Friday morning.
